name: Block Blast
creator: Aleksey Konstantinov
description: Why not indulge in a relaxing gaming session with Block Blast Unblocked? This awesome block puzzle game is all about unwinding and exercising your brain. You’ll have an 8x8 grid at your disposal, along with three blocks to choose from at the bottom. It’s similar to Tetris, but with a more laid-back vibe. Your goal is to strategically place the blocks to clear entire lines or columns. It’s easy to learn, but challenging enough to keep you engaged and entertained. The best part? You can play in two exciting modes: Classic Mode: Just for fun, no pressure or stress. Adventure Mode: For those who love a good challenge and level-based puzzles.
